alert.note: Alert for Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Lanier; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 04 at 11:01AM EST until January 04 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Cook County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Berrien County in south central Georgia... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Brooks County in south central Georgia... * Until noon EST. * At 1100 AM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Hahira to 8 miles northeast of Quitman to 13 miles southeast of Boston, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Lakeland, Quitman, Valdosta, Adel, Hahira, Ray City, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Morven, Cecil, Barretts, New Lois, Greggs, Hansell, Nankin and Empress. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for south central Georgia. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EST for south central Georgia.
